main.name: Pareesh Madan
main.description: Hard-Working Software Engineer and Computer Science Student at the University of Guelph
main.bio: I have always been fascinated with the boundless and infinite capabilities of computers which motivated me to pursue a future in Computer Science. Currently pursing internship oppurtunities for Fall 2025.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to email me at madanp@uoguelph.ca or call me at 519-362-1324

education.degree: Bachelor of Computer Science, Business Data Analytics Minor (Co-op)
education.description: Relevant Courses: OOP, Data Structures, Software System Development & Integration, Operating Systems

work.title: Software Engineer Co-op
work.description: Working closely with internal and external stakeholders to drive incident resolution, ensure compliance, and optimize end-to-end operational processes.
work.description2: Contributing to system and network design discussions, infrastructure security audits, and automation initiatives to improve platform resilience and agility.

work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description: Developed a prototype neural network using TensorFlow for image classification to detect diseases in cow lymph nodes, trained on a dataset of over 3,500 annotated DICOM-formatted X-ray images.
work.description2: Designed and implemented a Python-based image format converter program, streamlining the preprocessing of DICOM images for training the neural network.
